PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2006-12712006-11-02,  CWB,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Wheat Board Act
PrecisAuthority for THE CANADIAN WHEAT BOARD (a) to adjust its accounts, as of December 31, 2005, by transferring the undistributed funds in the 1996-1997, 1997-1998 and 1998-1999 pool accounts for wheat and in the 1998-1999 accounts for amber durum wheat and designated barley to a separate account ; and (b) to pay to producers, out of that account, the amount to which they are entitled.
AttachmentsAttachment
